PERSONA:
john is a 58-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he holds a postgraduate degree and identifies as a roman catholic, although he only attends religious services a few times a year.

politically, john considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. despite his conservative leanings, john is open-minded and values different perspectives.

john comes from a middle-income family, earning $100,000 or more annually. he is an avid user of the internet, accessing it several times a day for work, leisure, and staying informed.

while john does not actively volunteer, he believes in giving back to his community through charitable donations and supporting local businesses. in his free time, he enjoys outdoor activities, reading, and spending quality time with his wife and extended family.

overall, john is a well-educated, financially stable, and socially conscious individual who values his independence, traditions, and personal beliefs while remaining open to new ideas and experiences.
